items.py¶

class anduryl.core.items.Items(project)[source]¶

Bases: object

Items class. Contain the properties for all items, as well as functions to add or remove items (questions) from the class.

add_item(item_id)[source]¶

Add item to list, also assigns a default value for the scale (uniform) and adds an item to the question list, realizations array, assessment array and infoscore per item array.

Parameters

item_id (str) – Item (question) id

clear()[source]¶

Clears all id’s, scales and questions.

get_idx(question_type='both', where=False)[source]¶

Returns the index of a question type: seed, target or both

Parameters

  • question_type (str, optional) – Question type to return (seed, target or both), by default ‘both’

  • where (bool, optional) – Whether to return the indices instead of a boolean array, by default False

Returns

Array with position of questions as booleans or indices

Return type

np.ndarray

initialize(nitems)[source]¶

Initialize (empty) class. Allocates the lists and arrays given the number of seed and target questions

Parameters

nitems (int) – Number of items

remove_item(item_id)[source]¶

Removes an item from the class. Removes the item from the id’s, scale, questions, realizations, assessesments and information score per item

Parameters

item_id (str) – Item (question) id
